title: Radiopop cover type
content: Now I don't recon' I know this type face youngin' but I know we can russle up some of the good cowboys and cowgirls here and come up with something, little Syuzi ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221846im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/lol.gif) and you'all have a nice day
author: dan

comments.content: Well, [Yearling](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221846/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/yearling/regular/testdrive.html?s=radiopop&p=72) isn't it, but it's damned close. I know the counters are squared off and the a isn't right, but man!
